author: dagim
title: NuNet: Decentralized SPO Computing
description: How to increase the decentralization & resilience of the Cardano network and reduce reliance on big tech cloud on the hardware level?
solution: NuNet will enable SPOs to run computing workflows on community provisioned hardware, increasing resilience and aiding decentralization.
experience:
Team leader: Dr. V. Kabir Veitas - AI researcher & software architect; co-founder & CEO, NuNet.io
